content.rendered:
The Saratoga Springs City School District will hold a Realtor Information Event on Thursday, March 14 at 10 a.m.  Realtors can attend the event in person at the MacFadden Administration Building or watch via Webex.

During the event, real estate agents and brokers will learn key details about schools in the Saratoga Springs City School District, including unique features that might attract potential homebuyers. The event will also cover attendance zones, including flex zones, and new student registration information.
